title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 43-1.17 - Commissioner's orders
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 43-1.17 - Commissioner's orders

State Regulations

If a local health official fails to provide or secure tuberculosis health care services or to pay providers for such services rendered under the terms of this Subpart, the State Health Commissioner upon notice and opportunity to be heard may order the local health official to provide or secure the services or to make such payment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
43-1.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
